price: Na Mwenyezi Mungu anataka kukurejezeni kwenye ut'iifu wake, na wanao taka kufuata matamanio wanataka mkengeuke makengeuko makubwa.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَيُرِيدُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ أَن تَمِيلُواْ مَيۡلًا عَظِيمٗا
footnotes: Na Mwenyezi Mungu anataka mrejee katika ut'iifu wake, na wale wanao fuata ladha zao, na matamanio yao machafu, miongoni mwa makafiri na waasi, wanataka muwe mbali kabisa na njia ya haki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yurīdu an yatūba ʿalaykum wayurīdu alladhīna yattabiʿūna al-shahawāti an tamīlū maylan ʿaẓīman
